      • isPlfVersionUpToDate

        public ARUpdaterUploadPlfVersionInfo isPlfVersionUpToDate(String rootFolder,
                                                 ARDISCOVERY_PRODUCT_ENUM product,
                                                 int version,
                                                 int edition,
                                                 int extension)
                                                   throws ARUpdaterException
        Test if the plf in the root folder is up to date compare to the given product information
        Returns:
        true is the plf is up to date, false otherwise
        Throws:
        ARUpdaterException - throws ARUpdaterException if there is a bad parameter or if there is no plf file in the root folder
